extracted-table.table-caption: Group differences in domain-specific clinical outcome z-scores.

caption.p: Group differences in domain-specific clinical outcome z-scores.

fn.p: Table includes domain name, number of patients per group with complete data, group mean and standard deviation of computed Z-score, FDR-corrected p-value, and test statistic (T). MS EDSS ≤ 1: MS patients with expanded disability status scale score less than or equal to 1; MS EDSS ≥ 2: MS patients with expanded disability status scale score greater than or equal to 2; FDR: false discovery rate; FSS: Fatigue severity scale; BDI-II: Beck’s depression inventory – second edition.

extracted-table.table-caption: Between-group differences in component-wise static functional connectivity.

caption.p: Between-group differences in component-wise static functional connectivity.

fn.p: Table includes an indication of group pair used for a set of tests (Group comparison), brain region (Regions) and network labels (Networks) for corresponding components (Components), uncorrected p-values (puncorr.), FDR-corrected p-values (pFDR), T-values and Cohen’s effect size (d). EDSS: Expanded disability status scale; FDR: false discovery rate; ANG: angular gyrus; CB: cerebellum; PCG: paracingulate gyrus; MFG: middle frontal gyrus; ACG: anterior cingulate gyrus; STG: superior temporal gyrus, posterior division; SMA: supplementary motor area; LOcc: Lateral occipital cortex, superior division; SMG: supramarginal gyrus; BG: basal ganglia; DMN: default mode network; FPN: fronto-parietal control network; vATT: ventral attention network; dATT: dorsal attention network; SMN: somatomotor network; VIS: visual network.

fn.label: a
fn.p: Component region labels are bilateral unless otherwise noted.

extracted-table.table-caption: Group differences in state five fraction time after age regression.

caption.p: Group differences in state five fraction time after age regression.

fn.p: Table includes test statistics and p-values from the omnibus Kruskal-Wallis test and the Dunn’s test for pairwise comparisons. Significant results are marked with an asterisk. Df: degrees of freedom; FDR: false discovery rate; HC: healthy control participants; MS EDSS ≤ 1: MS patients with expanded disability status scale score less than or equal to 1; MS EDSS ≥ 2: MS patients with expanded disability status scale score greater than or equal to 2.
